thread.title: Why Obama claim he is a better leader than Putin is raising eyebrows
thread.title_full: Why Obama claim he is a better leader than Putin is raising eyebrows - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Why Obama claim he is a better leader than Putin is raising eyebrows
text: President Barack Obama sat down for an interview that aired Sunday on 60 minutes, according to Fox News. In short order, the conversation turned to Vladimir Putin’s intervention in Syria with the goal of propping up the regime of Bashir Assad. The vigorous military campaign that involves aerial bombing of anti-Assad rebels and the introduction of Iranian ground troops has been contrasted with Obama’s disastrous attempt to arm and train local militias to fight against ISIS. Obama made an extraordinary observation as to why he is still the better leader than Putin. The matter lies in where one’s priorities are. Photo by Rob Kim/Getty Images
